Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Crestaraths around the Quarantine Zone Research Center have been spreading disease to anyone who tries to venture through the area.

Destroy the {@LinkCreature:40#27#crestarath slayers}, {@LinkCreature:40#26#reapers}, and {@LinkCreature:40#25#archers}.

Report to Coordinator Glasrinne when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
